These women may develop hirsutism, acne, an enlarged clitoris (clitoromegaly), and a deep voice. These features can appear as early as 12 weeks of pregnancy and go away soon after delivery.",GHR,aromatase deficiency
How many people are affected by aromatase deficiency ?,The prevalence of aromatase deficiency is unknown; approximately 20 cases have been described in the medical literat
